concept.title: PGI 219.803 Selecting acquisitions for the 8(a) Program.

conbody.p: (1) Contracting activities should respond to SBA requests for contract support within 30 calendar days after receipt.
(2) Before considering a small business set-aside, review the acquisition for offering under the 8(a) Program.
